titles.title: Office of Disability Congressional Research Act of 2018
To establish the Office of Disability Congressional Research at the National Council on Disability.
Office of Disability Congressional Research Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Housing for the elderly and disabled

bill.summary:
Office of Disability Congressional Research Act of 2018
This bill establishes the Office of Disability Congressional Research within the National Council on Disability. The bill also expands the duties of the council to include responding to congressional requests for information regarding the effects of regulations, legislation, and guidance on individuals with disabilities, their families, and the existing systems of services and support for them.
